articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: India's leaked WC jersey sparks furore over 2 stars instead of 3 in Asia Cup kit - Hindustan Times
articles.description: On Friday, during India's Asia Cup match against Bangladesh, a glimpse of India's ODI World Cup jersey was leaked online. | Cricket
articles.content: In less than three weeks, India's World Cup campaign will get underway at the MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai when the hosts take on five-time champions Australia in their opener on October 8. The … [+2133 chars]
